This premier ski-in, ski-out resort places you just steps from the renowned Grand Hirafu slopes, offering some of the finest powder in the world. Recognised multiple times as Japan’s Best Ski Boutique Hotel at the World Ski Awards, Ki Niseko combines traditional elegance with modern convenience. Indulge in the serene experience of the hotel's onsen, take advantage of the ski valet service, and savor a delightful fusion of Japanese and Western cuisine at the on-site restaurant. Thoughtfully designed rooms provide stunning views, maximizing comfort and relaxation. Carve through Niseko’s famous light powder snow, while also enjoying the cultural richness of Japan. Explore local traditions, visit historical sites, and taste authentic cuisine, creating an unforgettable ski holiday in this iconic destination.
